item.g:title: Baby Loves Yoga
item.g:description: B is for Bow, C is for Cat and D is for Downward Dog in this beautiful ABC book designed to teach very young children the basics of yoga. Stunningly illustrated with a cut-to-white aesthetic, each pocket-sized book is a perfect introduction to a key topic for babies. Features: Baby loves yoga : an ABC of first poses, by Isabel Serna and Jennifer Eckford, ISBN: 9780711253278, 15 x 15cm, hardback book, 30 pages,

item.g:title: Be Strong : kind words for difficult times
item.g:description: You are enough, you are brave and determined, and you can overcome any obstacle or setback that stands in your way. Whenever you struggle with your self-belief, pick yourself up with this little book of feel-good quotations and statements that will remind you how incredibly strong you are.

item.g:title: Beach Hut 500-Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
item.g:description: Step inside a charming seaside retreat with this 500-piece Beach Hut Jigsaw Puzzle, where the view opens out to golden sands and rolling waves. Designed from the perspective inside the beach hut, this vibrant puzzle captures the cozy, sun-soaked atmosphere of a perfect day by the sea. Features: 500-piece Beach Hut design jigsaw puzzle, Made from high quality coated board, Exclusive to Cancer Research UK , When you've completed your puzzle, why not donate it to your nearest Cancer Research UK shop to be loved by someone else? Find your nearest shop or superstore here.

item.g:title: Bee Activity Book
item.g:description: Follow the journey of a bee in this beautifully illustrated sticker activity book. With over 200 stickers, plus wordsearches, puzzles, colouring activities and mazes throughout, this brilliant book will keep little hands busy for hours. Fun and exciting activities engage young minds and encourage them to explore and protect the natural world. Readers will love exploring each setting while learning more about a beloved species which is crucial for the eco system. Bee activity book, nature's tiny miracle by Britta Teckentrup, ISBN: 9781801044523, Paperback, 28 x 23 x 1cm, 346g, Little Tiger Press, 2023,

item.g:title: Bex Mid-Length Synthetic Hair Wig - Deep Burgundy / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: A ready-made, medium-length acrylic wig with a choppy layered bob. Made from modacrylic synthetic fibres and a high quality hand-tied partial monofilament fabric top, with comfortable open wefted back. Features: Available in 3 shades: Chestnut, Deep Burgundy, and Brown Mahogany., Adjustable elastic hooks allow you to tighten or loosen the wig., Includes full aftercare information and safety leaflet., Includes a complimentary 15-minute virtual consultation with a Wig Specialist to discuss aftercare, styling and answer any questions you may have., 70g, With each purchase, you will receive a complimentary 15-minute virtual consultation with a Wig Specialist to discuss aftercare, styling and answer any questions you may have. To arrange your call, please follow this link: https://www.morehairnow.com/online-booking, select a time and date, enter your details and add the hashtag #CancerCare to the comments section.

item.g:title: Bordlite ABS Hardshell Suitcase - Cabin / Black
item.g:description: Whether you're jetting off around the world, setting sail on a cruise, or holidaying right here in the UK, these lightweight but hardwearing suitcases are ideal for your travels. Available in 4 colours and 3 sizes, each case features a telescopic handle, 4 double spinner wheels, and a built-in combination lock. The cabin-size case is also cabin approved for major airlines including British Airways, EasyJet, Emirates, Jet2, Ryanair, and Virgin Atlantic.* Please note, the prices shown online include a £7.50 delivery charge. These suitcases may be available in your local Cancer Research UK shop without the delivery charge. * Correct at time of publication. Always check the dimensions yourself against your airline's luggage guidelines and note any luggage fees. Cancer Research UK is not affiliated with any of these airlines or responsible for this product's use or subsequent luggage charges.

item.g:title: Bordlite ABS Hardshell Suitcase - Cabin / Champagne
item.g:description: Whether you're jetting off around the world, setting sail on a cruise, or holidaying right here in the UK, these lightweight but hardwearing suitcases are ideal for your travels. Available in 4 colours and 3 sizes, each case features a telescopic handle, 4 double spinner wheels, and a built-in combination lock. The cabin-size case is also cabin approved for major airlines including British Airways, EasyJet, Emirates, Jet2, Ryanair, and Virgin Atlantic.* Please note, the prices shown online include a £7.50 delivery charge. These suitcases may be available in your local Cancer Research UK shop without the delivery charge. * Correct at time of publication. Always check the dimensions yourself against your airline's luggage guidelines and note any luggage fees. Cancer Research UK is not affiliated with any of these airlines or responsible for this product's use or subsequent luggage charges.

item.g:title: Bowelbabe Fund Bathroom Towels Bundle - Blue
item.g:description: Add a a vibrant flair to your bathroom with this set of blue towels. This bundle includes 1 of each of a hand mitt, hand towel, bath towel and bath sheet. These towels are also available to purchase individually from the majority of Cancer Research UK shops and superstores. Please support the Bowelbabe Fund for Cancer Research UK, raising money to fund clinical trials, research and cancer information and awareness, as well as other initiatives to combat cancer and support those affected by cancer. The Bowelbabe Fund for Cancer Research UK is a restricted fund within Cancer Research UK.

item.g:title: Brachiosaurus Dino Pin Badge
item.g:description: Roar with excitement with this Brachiosaurus Dino Pin Badge. Similar to its prehistoric friend, the Stegosaurus, this colourful and durable pin badge features a butterfly clasp on the reverse so it can stay firmly in place. Not only is it suitable for kids and teens, but also ideal for the big kid in you. Bring a dino-mite of fun to your day while support an incredible cause, the fight against cancer. Features: Butterfly clutch fitting, Backing card included, Assembly required, The poly bags used are made from Polypropylene material which is recycled,

item.g:title: Brave Lion Warrior Pin Badge
item.g:description: Can't seem to find the right words? item.g:title: Breathe
item.g:description: Breathing properly is one of the simplest ways to increase your energy, improve your sleep and reduce stress. Moreover, you can practise alone, and it's free. Drawing on the practices of yoga, meditation and mindfulness, this book provides clear, step-by-step instructions for 20 exercises to improve the way you breathe. Learn the essentials such as moving breath, mindful breathing and how to rebalance the breath, and open yourself up to feelings of renewed energy. Breathe : simple breathing techniques for a calmer, happier life by Jean Hall, ISBN: 9781837830718, Hardback, 19 x 14 x 2cm, 378g, 142 pages, Quadrille Publishing, 2024,

item.g:title: Bumblebee Pin Badge
item.g:description: Create a buzz with this Bumblebee Pin Badge. Delicate and simply beautiful, it features a clean, silver embossed bee design. Ideal for those nature lovers and animal fanatics to show your support in the fight against cancer. Features: Backing card included, Butterfly clutch fitting, Assembly required, The poly bags used are made from Polypropylene material which is recycled,

item.g:title: Busy Beach 1000-Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
item.g:description: Bring the joy of a bustling seaside escape to your table with this 1,000-piece jigsaw puzzle, packed with colour, charm, and coastal fun. From the golden sands to the sparkling sea, this vibrant scene is alive with activity—perfect for puzzle lovers who enjoy rich detail and a touch of summer nostalgia. Features: 1,000-piece Busy Beach design jigsaw puzzle, Made from high quality coated board, Exclusive to Cancer Research UK , When you've completed your puzzle, why not donate it to your nearest Cancer Research UK shop to be loved by someone else? Find your nearest shop or superstore here.

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Cycling Jersey - XS
item.g:description: Show your support for Cancer Research UK on the track or road with this professional quality cycling jersey. Made from breathable sports fabric, it features 3 rear pockets to keep all your ride essentials within easy reach. Features: Short-sleeved, Quick drying, with breathable moisture management, 3 rear pockets, See size guide for measurements. Sleeve circumference is 26cm and collar height 4cm in all sizes.,

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Foldable Water Bottle
item.g:description: Don't get weighed down by big and bulky water bottles, this Cancer Research UK-branded water bottle is collapsible to take up less room when not in use. Flexible enough to stand upright when full yet, when empty, can be rolled, folded or flattened. Features: Supplied with pre-attached carabiner hook, Approximately 26 x 12 x 3 cm, 480ml / 16fl oz capacity, BPA-free PET, PE, and nylon construction, Freezer safe ,

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Men's Running Vest
item.g:description: Show your support for Cancer Research UK when you're out running or jogging, or taking part in an event, with this lightweight running vest. Bold Cancer Research UK brand colours with our logo front and back. Available in sizes S - XL.

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Multifunction Buff Tubular Snood (Blue)
item.g:description: Ideal for all-year-round use, this super-soft tubular snood has many uses - from a neckerchief to a full head covering, headband to hairband. Please note, this is not designed to be used as PPE or a medical grade face mask.

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Post-Mastectomy Swimsuit - 8 / Black / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Introducing the Cancer Research UK Post-Mastectomy Swimsuit. Designed with comfort, confidence, and support in mind, this thoughtfully crafted swimsuit is ideal for post-surgery wear. The swimsuit includes fixed pre-formed cups with pockets to accommodate a swim prosthesis, and specially constructed internal stitching supports and keeps them in place. Features: Available in 2 colour options: navy and black, sizes 8-24, Adjustable straps, Flattering built up coverage to help cover any scarring, Powermesh to the front for tummy control, Soft elasticated under bust shelf, Gusset lined ,

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Post-Surgery Comfort Bra - S / Black / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Introducing the Cancer Research UK Post-Surgery Comfort Bra: a bra developed by us with breast cancer patients every step of the way. Made from a super soft, knitted fabric with a tubular, seamless design, the bra offers the ultimate in comfort and support. The wide, fully adjustable straps and front hook and eye fastenings ensure a perfect fit. Suitable for use after a mastectomy, lumpectomy, lymph node removal, or breast reconstruction. A lined pocket with removable pads also provides space to add a prothesis, if desired. It's also designed to be comfortable for everyday wear for non-patients, too. The main fabric is derived from natural bamboo that's soft against sensitive skin, as well as being breathable, moisture wicking, and antibacterial. Ideal for all day and long-term wear. Find out more by watching our video guide to adjusting the bra for your body. Over the last 40 years, Cancer Research UK's work has helped double breast cancer survival. Every sale of this bra ensures that progress continues, with 100% of net profits funding future breast cancer research projects. Features: Available in 4 colour options: white, black, blush, and hot pink, Available in size ranges Small to 3XL - see size guide for details, Wide shoulder straps, Hook and eye fastening at centre front, with 3 adjustable settings, 100% net profits are donated directly to our breast cancer research projects,

item.g:title: Cancer Research UK Post-Surgery Comfort Bra - S / Blush / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Introducing the Cancer Research UK Post-Surgery Comfort Bra: a bra developed by us with breast cancer patients every step of the way. Made from a super soft, knitted fabric with a tubular, seamless design, the bra offers the ultimate in comfort and support. The wide, fully adjustable straps and front hook and eye fastenings ensure a perfect fit. Suitable for use after a mastectomy, lumpectomy, lymph node removal, or breast reconstruction. A lined pocket with removable pads also provides space to add a prothesis, if desired. It's also designed to be comfortable for everyday wear for non-patients, too. The main fabric is derived from natural bamboo that's soft against sensitive skin, as well as being breathable, moisture wicking, and antibacterial. Ideal for all day and long-term wear. Find out more by watching our video guide to adjusting the bra for your body. Over the last 40 years, Cancer Research UK's work has helped double breast cancer survival. Every sale of this bra ensures that progress continues, with 100% of net profits funding future breast cancer research projects. item.g:title: Cross Everything: A personal journey into the evolution of cancer
item.g:description: When Henry Scowcroft's partner Zarah was diagnosed with stage IV bladder cancer in her mid-thirties, their world fell apart. In order to cope with the upheaval as they endured scans, aggressive chemotherapy and hospital stays, Henry began writing down and sharing their experiences with friends and family. His day job as a writer for the charity Cancer Research UK helped him to explain everything he was learning from the coalface of cancer treatment - including Zarah's diagnosis, and their rollercoaster journey through the health system. After Zarah's untimely death Henry found some closure and comfort by trying to learn more about her cancer from scientific analysis of the test results and biopsies taken during her treatment, and enlisted a team of doctors and researchers to help him. Could he have done more? How did Zarah's tumour develop? Could there be a legacy from her death that would help others diagnosed with cancer? This heart-wrenching memoir of love and loss is interspersed with Henry's mission to understand the cancer that took his partner too soon. Reviews "A moving, compelling and vital book, that sheds much needed light on the very latest understanding of cancer." Siddhartha Mukherjee, author of The Emperor of All Maladies "Sensitive and informed. Essential reading for anyone supporting a loved one through cancer." Deborah James, writer and broadcaster "A gripping, heartbreaking, accessible personal journey through love and cancer." Charles Graeber, New York Times bestselling author of The Breakthrough "Cross Everything may be the most heartbreaking medical memoir you'll read." The Daily Mail

item.g:title: Dad Guardian Angel Remembrance Decoration
item.g:description: A simply beautiful way to remember a father who is no longer with you, but always watching over you. Measuring approximately 9 x 8 x 2cm, these angels bring year-round heartfelt comfort.

item.g:title: Daisy the Dachshund Coaster Set
item.g:description: Prevent damage to your surfaces with this pack of 4 drinks coasters featuring Daisy the Dachshund Co-ordinating items also available.

item.g:title: Daisy the Dachshund Duo Tea Towels
item.g:description: Add some charm to your kitchen with Daisy the Dachshund Duo Tea Towels. Keep your kitchen clean and stylish with Daisy by your side! 2 Pack of Tea Towels Other co-ordinating items also available.

item.g:title: Daisy the Dachshund Plaque
item.g:description: Add a touch of charm to your home with Daisy the Dachshund Plaque It reads "A Dachshund makes a House A Home" Co-ordinating items also available.

item.g:title: Daisy the Dachshund Walker Umbrella
item.g:description: Embrace the rainy days with Daisy the Dachshund Walker Umbrella. Perfect for dog lovers and for adding a touch of fun on gloomy days.

item.g:title: Deluxe Wig Caps - Pack of 2 - Beige
item.g:description: Wig caps are a fabulous addition to your wig journey. They provide a layer of protection against the wig and your head, helping to keep your scalp clean, prevent friction and assist in gripping the wig. Ideal for patients with total hair loss who have a sensitive scalp, as they can help to avoid irritation or discomfort. The caps hold everything in place, allowing your wig to sit as close to your scalp as possible.

item.g:title: Deluxe Wig Caps - Pack of 2 - Black
item.g:description: Wig caps are a fabulous addition to your wig journey. They provide a layer of protection against the wig and your head, helping to keep your scalp clean, prevent friction and assist in gripping the wig. Ideal for patients with total hair loss who have a sensitive scalp, as they can help to avoid irritation or discomfort. The caps hold everything in place, allowing your wig to sit as close to your scalp as possible.

item.g:title: Desk Yoga Deck
item.g:description: This accessible guide to mental and physical health works at work no matter where you have your desk. Organized into Chair Yoga, Standing Yoga, Pranayama and Mudras, and Meditation and Mindfulness exercises, the deck offers 52 practices that can be done anytime, anywhere. Whether you need a stretch break or a mental reset, whether you have 10 minutes during lunch or only 2 minutes between calls, there is something for everyone - and no mat required. Features: Desk yoga deck : 52 simple practices for mental and physical wellness no matter where you work, ISBN: 9781797214320, 16 x 10cm, hardback book, 52 pages,

item.g:title: Diamond Design Planter - 25cm
item.g:description: Add some contemporary style to your houseplants anywhere around the home with this Morocco-inspired diamond design planter. Features: Polyresin planter with white diamond design, Available in 3 sizes: 25cm, 30cm, and 35cm diameter, 3kg / 4.5kg / 6kg, Other planter designs are also available ,

item.g:title: Diamond Design Planter - 30cm
item.g:description: Add some contemporary style to your houseplants anywhere around the home with this Morocco-inspired diamond design planter. Features: Polyresin planter with white diamond design, Available in 3 sizes: 25cm, 30cm, and 35cm diameter, 3kg / 4.5kg / 6kg, Other planter designs are also available ,

item.g:title: Diamond Design Planter - 35cm
item.g:description: Add some contemporary style to your houseplants anywhere around the home with this Morocco-inspired diamond design planter. Features: Polyresin planter with white diamond design, Available in 3 sizes: 25cm, 30cm, and 35cm diameter, 3kg / 4.5kg / 6kg, Other planter designs are also available ,

item.g:title: Dino Domino
item.g:description: A game for two to four players, with 28 cute and colourful dino dominoes. Have fun matching seven prehistoric critters, and get your last domino down first to win the game and become T-rex. The dominoes come in an attractive sliding box with quirky illustrations by Caroline Selmes. Dino domino, ISBN 9781786273581, 12 x 21cm,

item.g:title: Disney 100 Set of 3 Alice In Wonderland Hanging Decorations
item.g:description: Celebrate 100 years of Disney with these limited-edition Alice in Wonderland hanging decorations. Made from polyresin and hand painted in silver and white, these Alice, Mad Hatter, and Cheshire Cat characters can add a fun addition to your tree this season. Features: Box size 16 x 8 x 3cm, Hand painted white and silver decorations, with white ribbon and silver metal tag, Boxed, Officially licenced merchandise,

item.g:title: Disney 100 Set of 3 Toy Story Hanging Decorations
item.g:description: Celebrate 100 years of Disney with these limited-edition Toy Story hanging decorations. Made from polyresin and hand painted in silver and white, these Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and Alien characters can add a fun addition to your tree this season. Features: Box size 16 x 8 x 3cm, Hand painted white and silver decorations, with white ribbon and silver metal tag, Boxed, Officially licenced merchandise,

item.g:title: Disney 100 Toy Story Woody Glass Bauble
item.g:description: Celebrating the 100th Anniversary of the Walt Disney Company, this beautiful glass bauble showcases a printed image of Woody from Toy Story. The bauble is filled with sparkling silver stars and features a silhouette image on the reverse. Finished with a silver topper, red velvet hanger, and a 'Disney 100' silver metal charm. Features: 8cm diameter, 18cm height including hanger, Officially licensed merchandise,

item.g:title: Disney Ariel Snowglobe
item.g:description: Let this beautiful Disney snowglobe featuring The Little Mermaid's Ariel be a part of your world this Christmas. Surrounded by silver-green glitter and the phrase "Part of your world..." around the base in silver. An ideal stocking filler for any Little Mermaid fan. Features: 16cm diameter x 20cm tall, Glass globe,

item.g:title: Disney Belle Snowglobe
item.g:description: This beautiful Disney snowglobe features a figurine of Beauty and the Beast's Belle surrounded by gold glitter. The phrase "Tale as old as time" surrounds the base in silver. An ideal stocking filler for any Beauty and the Beast fan. Features: 16cm diameter x 20cm tall, Glass globe,

item.g:title: Disney Dumbo First Christmas Hanging Decoration
item.g:description: Celebrate a little one's first Christmas with this cute Dumbo hanging decoration. Showing Dumbo wearing a Santa hat, scarf, and with a wrapped gift, the base of the decoration reads 'My first Christmas'. The perfect keepsake from the first festive season. Features: 8.5 x 7 x 16.5cm including hanger, 8cm tall without hanger, 184g, Made from durable polyresin, Includes gold hanging ribbon,

item.g:title: Disney Mickey & Minnie Christmas Kisses Snowglobe
item.g:description: A cute and cosy stocking filler for any Disney fan, this snowglobe features Mickey and Minnie sharing a kiss whilst surrounded by glitter. Features: 12cm diameter x 16cm tall, 1.384kg, Glass globe,

item.g:title: Disney Princess Musical Jewellery Box - Ariel
item.g:description: Store all your shiny things, gadgets, gizmos, whosits and whatsits in a manner fit for a Disney Princess with this Little Mermaid Ariel musical jewellery box. Featuring a pastel blue box with Ariel's name in gold foil, with Ariel showing Flounder a book. The wind-up mechanism plays Beautiful Dreamer when the box is opened and an Ariel plaque gently rotates inside. The perfect gift for any Disney Princess fan. Features: Belle design also available, 10.5 x 11.5 x 8.5cm, Packaging size: 11 x 11.5 x 9cm, 258g, Wind-up musical mechanism, Oval-shaped mirror under the sea lid, Silver shell-shaped push clasp,

item.g:title: Disney Set of 12 Mini Mickey Baubles
item.g:description: Let the mighty, magical Mickey Mouse adorn your Christmas tree this festive season with these assorted baubles. The instantly recognisable ear shape baubles feature 5 different finishes in gold, red, black, silver and white. Features: Each bauble approximately 5.5 x 4 x 10cm (including hanging ribbon), Made from durable plastic,

item.g:title: Disney Winnie 3D Relief Christmas Mug
item.g:description: Let Winnie help keep your cup of tea, coffee or hot chocolate hot this winter in this adorable mug. Not only does Winnie look cute, the Santa hat he's wearing is actually a lid to help keep the heat in! Features: Earthenware (dolomite) mug, 13 x 12 x 14cm, 412g,

item.g:title: Disney Winnie the Pooh Fabric Christmas Advent Calendar
item.g:description: Countdown to Christmas in the most adorable way with this Winnie the Pooh fabric advent calendar. Fill it with daily treats and hang on a wall or door to enjoy over the festive season year after year. Decorated with Winnie the Pooh characters. Features: 24 pockets to fill with your own treats, 43 x 89 x 3cm, 200g. Height without hanging rope: 72cm.,

item.g:title: Disposable Car Seat Cover
item.g:description: You've done an amazing job having fun and raising money at a Race for Life Pretty Muddy event - but you don't want to traipse mud into your car afterwards. Help keep your car clean with these disposable car seat covers. Sold singly.

item.g:title: Dog Bandana - M/L / Cyan
item.g:description: Your pooch will look paw-fect in this cute pet bandana whilst you're fundraising with your furry friend. Available in 2 sizes: Small/Medium: 52 x 26cm, Medium/Large: 74 x 37cm, ,

item.g:title: Dog Bandana - M/L / Pink
item.g:description: Your pooch will look paw-fect in this cute pet bandana whilst you're fundraising with your furry friend. Available in 2 sizes: Small/Medium: 52 x 26cm, Medium/Large: 74 x 37cm, ,

item.g:description: Your pooch will look paw-fect in this cute pet bandana whilst you're fundraising with your furry friend. Available in 2 sizes: Small/Medium: 52 x 26cm, Medium/Large: 74 x 37cm, ,

item.g:title: Dragonfly Pin Badge
item.g:description: Mark your special occasion with this beautiful dragonfly pin badge.A symbol of change and transformation, the dragonfly is a beautiful creature, and this our enamelled pin badge captures that wonderfully.Features: Dragonfly Wedding Favour, Silver coloured badge with white enamel in-fill, Approximately 3 x 2.9cm, badge 0.1cm thick, 1cm thick including pin, White backing card included, Butterfly clasp on back, Assembly required,

item.g:title: Dried Wildflower Petal Confetti
item.g:description: Sprinkle the well wishes with more of a meaning on your big day with this Dried Wildflower Petal Confetti. Dye-free, these slow falling, naturally biodegradable, dried delphinium and wildflower petals are handpicked and hand packed on a farm in Shropshire, UK, and packaged in recyclable glassine. Whether you shower the happy couple with love, or sprinkle the tables for a finishing touch, your purchase will be funding life-saving research and your wedding day will be helping save many lives. Sold singly., Dye-free., Naturally biodegradable petals., Outer packaging is made from glassine, and is recyclable.,

item.g:title: Explorer Foldable Handy Cart
item.g:description: Fantastic for festivals, brilliant on the beach: this foldable cart gives you extra carrying capacity whilst being easy to steer and store. The handle is adjustable to suit different body heights and provides easy steering no matter if you're pushing or pulling the cart. The extra-wide wheels handle a variety of terrains, including on the beach, with a wheel lock function to prevent the cart rolling away. And, when you're done, just fold it down for easy storage or transport in a car. No assembly required. Overall dimensions 90 x 56 x 99cm, weighs 9.5kg. Maximum load 100kg. An ideal accessory for picnics, camping, and gardening.

item.g:title: Extra Large Plush Bee Throw
item.g:description: If you're looking for some extra warm comfort this winter, this extra large throw could be just what you need. Featuring a large "Bee Happy" design, the throw is super-soft and cosy - ideal for those colder nights curled up on the sofa.

item.g:title: F*** You Cancer
item.g:description: Drink more green juices, eat turmeric, walk for three hours a day... I wanted to scream, run away and tell every well-meaning person to go and do one! Whilst this book doesn't advocate throwing all advice down the kitchen sink, it will empower you to do things your way as you navigate the big C roller coaster. Deborah James will take you through every twist and turn, reminding you that it's okay to feel one hundred different things in the space of a minute and showing you how you can still live your life and be yourself with cancer.

item.g:title: Food for Thought
item.g:description: Mindless eating is a modern-day malady. We reach for unhealthy snacks, don't take proper lunch breaks, and are constantly distracted while we eat. But by applying the principles of mindfulness to our everyday eating habits, we can make simple changes to our diet and learn how to appreciate and savour food. This book presents easy-to-follow mindfulness meditations, inspiring stories from people who have benefited from mindful eating, and delicious recipes which can set you on the path to a new and healthier way of eating. Food for thought : mindful eating to nourish body and soul by Rachel Bartholomew & Mandy Pearson, ISBN: 9781800653221, Hardback, 16 x 12 x 2cm, 254g, 160 pages, Ryland, Peters, & Small, 2024,

item.g:title: Good Morning Rituals
item.g:description: Every morning can be a good morning. Whether you choose to greet the day with a stretching ritual, take time over breakfast for a moment of gratitude, or perform a mindful meditation on your commute, with this book, you will discover how just a few reverent minutes each morning can imbue you with a sense of peace and purpose to last all day. Includes 50 ritual ideas to try, advice on creating your own, plus inspiring quotes and affirmations to guide you in your practice. Good morning rituals : daily rituals to help you rise and shine by Miranda Moore, ISBN: 9781800079267, Hardback, 16 x 12 x 2cm, 224g, 128 pages, Summersdale Publishing, 2023,

item.g:title: Grandma Sentiments Standing Plaque
item.g:description: Celebrate your loving grandmother with this sentimental freestanding plaque. The pink wooden plaque is decorated with a silver metal heart embellishment. It stands vertically and the text shares a heartfelt message with your friends and family. Features: Grandma Standing Plaque, Measures approximately 11.5 x 21cm, 290g, Display using the freestanding strut or wall hanging hook, Presented in a lidded box with belly band , The verse reads:Grandma. I always come to you when I need someone to turn to. Your kind smile and warm hugs always cheer me up. You give the best advice and have a lot of wisdom (as well as a lot of cake!). If I ever need a safe space, I know you will always welcome me with open arms and listening ears. You are so special and I don't know what I'd do without you. Your laugh is infectious and it always fills the room with warmth and joy. You are the one person who I will turn to no matter how old I get. Thank you for always being there. Love you so much. 5017224993204

item.g:title: Grow, Forage and Make: fun things to do with plants
item.g:description: Over 30 fun, easy to follow and rewarding growing projects, foraging activities, experiments, and arts and crafts activities for kids to enjoy. You don't need a garden or any fancy equipment - a homemade pot and watering can, seeds from the kitchen cupboard and a sunny windowsill will do. With Alys's expert guidance you can grow your own avocado tree, make wildflower seed paper, forage for tasty roots to add to your favourite recipes and even grow neon pink beetroot in the dark. Features: Grow, Forage and Make by Alys Fowler, illustrated by Heidi Griffiths, ISBN: 9781526619105, Paperback, 96 pages, 27 x 19cm, For ages 5+,

item.g:title: How To Find Calm in Five Minutes A Day
item.g:description: Pockets of calm are all around us, even on the busiest of days - and they're easy to find when you know where to look. All you need is five minutes. Guiding you through each stage of your day, these 60 soothing rituals will help you to recentre yourself and rise above everyday stresses.Tips include: how to incorporate mindfulness into your routine; starting the day with a relaxation exercise and a calming mantra; visualizing what calm looks like to you; writing down your worries to gain focus and perspective - and more. How to find calm in five minutes a day : inspiring ideas to bring you peace every day by Joanne Mallon, ISBN: 9781837990108, Paperback, 16 x 12 x 2cm, 228g, 128 pages, Summersdale Publishing, 2023,

item.g:title: How To Grow Your Dinner Without Leaving The House
item.g:description: A vegetable garden is not an option for everyone, and container growing has become desirable for people with little outside space.Claire Ratinon brings her urban food growing expertise to this popular subject, in a book designed to appeal to new gardeners and anyone who would like to take on the rewarding challenge of growing their own dinner, even if they've only got a window box or balcony to work with.The book covers all the essentials of growing a range of edible plants in pots and meeting each crop's specific needs.Features: How to grow your dinner without leaving the house, Written by Clare Ratinon, ISBN: 9781786277145, 21 x 17 x 2cm,

item.g:title: Human Hair Wig Deluxe Care Kit
item.g:description: Enhance and prolong the life of your wig with this selection of specially selected products. This kit was compiled to take into consideration your wig's need for specialist care, whilst making it as simple as possible for you to care for you wig from home. The Human Hair Deluxe Care Kit includes: Ellen Wille Pure Power Human Hair Shampoo 200ml - to gentle cleanse your wig without compromising the hair., Ellen Wille Pure Power Human Hair Conditioning Balsam 200ml - Detangles, strengthens, and makes the hair beautifully soft, silky, and easy to brush., Ellen Wille Pure Power Human Hair Care 'n' Repair 200ml - leave-in spray protects synthetic fibres from the daily environment., Wig Brush - Small oval paddle brush with metal bristles to minimize frizz., Wig Tree - Collapsible wig stand allowing your wig to dry naturally., Please note, the photograph shows the synthetic wig care kit, but you will receive the human hair kit.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Beyond Beauty 3in1 Sleep Aid Facial Mask
item.g:description: This beyond beauty 3in1 sleep aid facial mask by Jennifer Young is a gentle trio that can be used as a facial cleanser, moisturiser, and face mask to work as a sleep aid.To encourage a restful sleep, it features calming, fragrant, essential oils such as frankincense and lavender. For calming and healing properties, it features apricot kernel and calendula, as well as mango and shea butters to nourish the skin.This multi-tasking balm can also be used to remove make up and any other dirt and dust accumulated during the day. Features: 50g, Natural and organic essential oils, Developed specifically for cancer patients, Twist up opening, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Beyond Beauty Men's Frankincense Facial Mist
item.g:description: This beyond beauty facial hydration mist frankincense by Jennifer Young® contains one ingredient, Frankincense. Known for its anti-aging properties, it provides extra hydration in your morning routine and encourages rejuvenation at night, during sleep. To assist in the intensity of hot flushes and sweating, that may be developed from some cancer treatments, this hydration mist is a helpful choice in your day to day routine. Features: 100g, Spray applicator, Natural and organic essential oils, Developed specifically for cancer patients, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Beyond Beauty Sleep Aid Oil
item.g:description: This beyond beauty sleep aid oil by Jennifer Young® features a blend of essential oils to promote a good night's sleep. It assists in the aid of chronic insomnia that may often be experienced following some uncomfortable cancer treatments.To bring balance and renewal, this treatment contains jojoba, macadamia and rice bran. The essential oils such as incense, geranium, lavender, benzoin and ylang ylang have been chosen for their affinity to sleep encouragement. Features: 50g, Natural and organic essential oils, Developed specifically for cancer patients, Pipette applicator dispenses ideal amount to use, How to use: best used after beyond beauty night mask. Apply two drops of sleep aid oil, having warmed between your hands and spread it over your face.*Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.Ingredients: jojoba oil, coconut oil, rice bran oil, macadamia oil, vitamin e (tocopherol), frankincense, geranium, lavender, benzoin, ylang ylang

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Calming Foot Soak
item.g:description: Salt crystals blended with the soft, light citrus aroma of lime and bergamot essential oils helps relax your mind and alleviate the stress of the day. The Well Being Beauty Calming Foot Soak was formulated to promote inner peace. The therapeutic blend of essential oils was chosen for its calming properties and its fabulous, subtle fragrance, whilst rose petals interspersed with salt crystals make this a truly indulgent experience. Features: 200g, Vegetarian & Vegan friendly, 669014475169,

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Cool & Refresh Mist Spray
item.g:description: This Defiant Beauty Cool & Refresh mist spray by Jennifer Young® cools and tones even sensitive skin. Hot flushes and sweating may often be a side effect from some cancer treatments. This spritz helps cool and refresh the face and body whether you're on the go or needing to tackle the warmer months. Features: 100ml, Perfect for summer days and sunshine, Suitable for sensitive skin, 100% organic, Vegetarian and vegan friendly, Developed specifically for cancer patients, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Healing Hand Balm
item.g:description: This Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Healing Hand Balm features a blend of cocoa butter, coconut butter, apricot kernel oil, calendula oil, beeswax, vitamin e, neroli, frankincense and blood orange. An ideal alternative from the standard heavy and thick hand healing treatments, this multitasking balm is light, moisturising and easily absorbed, even when a small amount is applied. It targets sore skin that may have been developed from some cancer treatments, to help protect, heal and soothe hands as well as allowing you to continue with everyday tasks. Features: 50g, Lightly fragranced with essential oils associated with anti-aging, Developed specifically for cancer patients by Jennifer Young, Made from natural ingredients, Suitable for vegetarians, contains beeswax, Can be used as a daily hand cream or for intense treatments, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Itchy Skin Oil
item.g:description: This Defiant Beauty Itchy Skin Oil by Jennifer Young helps fight the intense itch and restore sore skin.Known for their soothing and relieving properties, it features a herbal blend of apricot kernel oil, sunflower oil, peach kernel oil, calendula oil, rosehip oil and vitamin e which is easily absorbed into the skin.During some cancer treatments, smells may often spark nausea and restrict usage of some applications. This fragrance-free formula lets you carry on with your skincare routine and allows you to feel more like yourself. Features: Fragrance free, Developed specifically for cancer patients, 100% organic, Ideal for sensitive skin, Pipette applicator dispenses ideal amount to use, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Men's Moisturising Cleanser Mask
item.g:description: This Jennifer Young defiant beauty 3in1 moisturising cleanser mask by Jennifer Young contains a mix of mango butter, shea butter, apricot kernel oil, calendula oil, beeswax and vitamin e.It's a gentle, multi-tasking balm that acts as a cleanser, moisturiser and face mask to aid delicate skin, developed from some chemotherapy and radiotherapy treatments. Moisturising the skin as it cleanses, it can be used to remove make-up and excess dirt accumulated during the day.Features: 50g, Fragrance free, Gentle alternative for sensitive skin, Developed specifically for cancer patients by Jennifer Young, *Please consult your doctor, nurse or healthcare professional before using a product and always read labels, warnings and directions provided with the product before using or consuming.

Lightly fragranced with essential oils.

item.g:title: Jennifer Young Sleep Ritual Foot Soak
item.g:description: A luxurious foot soak formulated to promote restful sleep, whilst nourishing the skin. This blend of lavender and sandalwood soothes and gently moisturises, dissolving straight into water, making a relieving bath salt or foot soak.Salt crystals blended with the soft, light citrus aroma of lime and bergamot helps to relax your mind and alleviate the stress of the day. Each foot soak also contains dried rose petals for a truly indulgent foot bath.The Jennifer Young Sleep Ritual Foot Soak contains the essential oils, sandalwood, lavender, bergamot and ylang ylang, chosen for their therapeutic benefits, reducing some of the underlying causes of sleeplessness, as well as their ability to induce sleep.Features: 200g, Vegetarian & Vegan friendly, 0753677149076, How to use:Add a generous amount to a foot bath and soak both feet for 20 minutes. Dry thoroughly.Can also be used as a bath salt to moisturise, calm and indulge.Ingredients:Epsomite (Epsom salts), Matricaria chamomilla (chamomile flowers), Santalum album (sandalwood), Cananga odorata (ylang ylang), Citrus bergamia (bergamot), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender).

item.g:title: Kay's Marvellous Medicine
item.g:description: The olden days were pretty fun if you liked wearing chainmail or chopping people's heads off but there was one tiny little problem back then... doctors didn't have the slightest clue about how our bodies worked. It's time to find out why Ancient Egyptians thought the brain was just a useless load of old stuffing that might as well be chucked in the bin, why teachers forced their pupils to smoke cigarettes, why hairdressers would cut off their customers' legs, and why people used to get paid for farting. If you're sure you're ready, then pop a peg on your nose, pull on your wellies, wash your hands and explore this gross and gruesome history of the human body!

item.g:title: Long Dragon Pin Badge
item.g:description: In Chinese culture, long dragons are seen as powerful, noble and significant symbols, featured in legends, festivals, astrology, art and more. They are seen as lucky and good - quite different to the Westernised dangerous, fire-breathing dragons. Whether you're celebrating the Long Dragon symbolism, or perhaps are a fan of the mythical and folklore, then this meaningful keepsake is for you.Features: Backing card included, Butterfly clasp, Assembly required, The poly bags used are made from Polypropylene material which is recycled,

item.g:title: Lotus Flower Pin Badge
item.g:description: As the flower grows naturally in ponds, it starts out rooted deep in mud and for it to blossom, it must make its way through the water to the top, and blooms in the sun as a beautiful and whole flower. A design taken from the common symbol of the Lotus Flower which, in many cultures, is often recognised as a symbol of purity and enlightenment. Perfect for those who love spiritual symbolism or simply for a delicately elegant, pretty silver design. Features: Backing card included, Butterfly pinch clasp, Assembly required, The poly bags used are made from Polypropylene material which is recycled,

item.g:title: MooGoo Anti-Ageing Antioxidant Face Cream
item.g:description: Help keep your skin hydrated and young-looking naturally with the MooGoo Anti-Ageing Antioxidant Face Cream. Packed with natural oils that mimic the oils produced by younger skin, this face cream is easily absorbed into the skin, helping to reduce lines forming. The antioxidants, Resveratrol and oil-soluble vitamin C, ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate, target free-radicals to reduce the damage they can cause to the skin. Added milk protein helps improve skin elasticity. Features: MooGoo Anti-Ageing Antioxidant Face Cream, 75g pump action bottle, A natural moisturiser to help improve sun damaged and ageing skin, Olive squalene mimics the oil younger skin naturally produces, High concentrations of antioxidants to combat free radical damage, Resveratrol is a natural antioxidant found in plants, Oil-soluble Vitamin C easily absorbs into skin and assists with sun damage, Naturally preserved with hops extract – free of parabens and phenoxyethanol,

item.g:title: MooGoo Argireline Amplified Peptide (5%) Anti-Ageing Serum
item.g:description: A deep-penetrating serum for improving skin firmness and fine lines. Features: MooGoo Argireline Amplified Peptide (5%) Anti-Ageing Serum, 25ml, Made with Modified Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 (Argireline® Amplified Peptide)., Deeply penetrates the skin to reduce fine lines and wrinkles at their source., Improve skin roughness, radiance, firmness, elasticity, and facial volume., Helps to diminish and prevent the very formation of expression lines., BeauActive® to target sun damage and stimulate collagen production., A truly advanced, multi-dimensional anti-ageing serum., This silky-smooth serum is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Based on in-vivo (aka, on real living skin) test results. ,

item.g:title: MooGoo Baby & Child 2-in-1 Bubbly Wash

Suitable for use on face & body, Naturally preserved with Hops Extract – free of Parabens and Phenoxyethanol ,

Tear-free formula., Piroctone Olamine helps maintain and control the microflora of the scalp ,

item.g:title: MooGoo Cow Lick Natural Lip Balm
item.g:description: Free from petroleum-based oils, this MooGoo lip balm is a little natural, nourishing moment for your lips. Dry, chapped lips can be a common side effect of cancer treatment, but you can help keep them soft and smooth with the blend of natural, oils found in the MooGoo lip balm. Made using coconut, apricot, jojoba and sweet almond oil to hydrate and nourish your lips. Allantoin helps the repair of minor cuts, and the added mandarin orange peel oil helps keep your lips in a healthy state... and it just tastes nice! Features: MooGoo Cow Lick Natural Lip Balm, 5g, Made with natural, edible ingredients, Made with moisturising oils to keep lips soft, free from all petroleum-based oils, 9335955000906

Complements the MooGoo Milk Shampoo for all-round cleaned and conditioned hair. item.g:description: Made from a combination of four coconut and glucose-based cleansers, MooGoo's Creamy Hydrating Face Cleanser is gentle enough for everyday use, morning and night, for all skin types. It's free from harsh, petroleum-based ingredients like SLS that may foam well but can be very irritating and drying to the skin. Due to its creamy texture, it can also double as a light shaving cream for men and women. Features: MooGoo Creamy Hydrating Face Cleanser, 250ml pump action bottle, Suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily, as well as blemish-prone skin, Can be used as a light shaving cream, Made with a combination of coconut and glucose based cleansers, and free from harsh synthetic detergents (SLS) that can dry out the skin, Phthalate-free fragrance oil for a beautiful smell without irritation, Free from all synthetic preservatives like phenoxyethanol or parabens, 9335955004294

item.g:title: MooGoo Fast Hydrating Lotion
item.g:description: Dry, flaking skin is a common side effect of cancer treatment. Moisturising regularly will help reduce irritation and keep the skin hydrated. MooGoo's Fast Hydrating Lotion was designed to absorb quickly and improve overall hydration. MooGoo made this lighter-weight moisturiser for people with thin, very sensitive or damaged skin. Whilst MooGoo's classic Skin Milk Udder Cream is a great all-round restorative cream, this lotion is for those who prefer something even lighter. Heavier creams are great to deeply nourish, nurture and protect dry skin, but they can also take a little longer to apply, especially all over the body on a regular basis. Packed with aloe vera and German chamomile to help keep skin cool, calm and collected. Features: MooGoo Fast Hydrating Lotion, 500g pump-action bottle, Designed to quickly replenish, revive and restore dry, dull skin, Nurtures and improves hydration of delicate, damaged, and sensitive skin, Made with natural, skin-loving oils like sweet almond and olive squalene, Suitable for all ages and skin types, including damaged skin from radiation therapy, For use on the face and body, 9335955002467

item.g:title: MooGoo Fresh Cream Deodorant - Coconut Cream
item.g:description: This MooGoo natural deodorant targets the bacteria that causes body odour, leaving a cool coconut scent that'll leave you dreaming of summer. 100% aluminium-free, this roll-on deodorant works by allowing odourless perspiration whilst controlling the odour-causing bacteria. Features: MooGoo Fresh Cream Deodorant - Coconut Cream, 60ml size, Easy-to-apply roll-on, Made with milk of magnesia and a sweet and warm honey scent, Aluminium-free, Naturally preserved with hops extract, free of parabens and phenoxyethanol, Suitable for all skin types,

Formulated for dry skin, MooGoo Full Cream Moisturiser is full of natural oils that are high in the types of fatty acids that healthy skin needs, helping to hydrate, moisturise and pamper dry skin. Added milk protein helps increase skin elasticity, and the combination of apple cider vinegar, natural pear and vanilla fragrance, gives this cream a delightful smell. Suitable for all skin types, this cream is for everyone, including babies and those with sensitive skin. Features: MooGoo Full Cream Moisturiser, Available in 2 sizes, 120g and 220g , Suitable for all skin types, Made with natural oils like sweet almond, coconut and olive oil, Includes natural healing ingredients like aloe vera and honey, Milk proteins help increase skin elasticity by up to 20%, Naturally preserved with hops extract, free of parabens and phenoxyethanol,

item.g:title: MooGoo Goat Milk Natural Cleansing Soap Bar
item.g:description: Cleanse and hydrate your skin with the help of goat's milk, a traditional remedy for irritated skin, with this MooGoo natural cleansing bar. Made using fresh goat's milk and saponified with cocoa seed butter and olive oil, it's a mild way to remove old oil and grease from the skin and replace these oils with pure nut oils and proteins. Goat's milk soap is especially suited to those people with very sensitive skin. Features: MooGoo Goat Milk Natural Cleansing Soap Bar, Large 130g bar. Some people with smaller hands or children may find it easier if the bar is cut into two pieces., Designed for people with dry skin but good for all skin types, Moisturising oils remain on the skin to keep it hydrated, 9335955000111

item.g:title: MooGoo Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide Active Serum

item.g:title: MooGoo Large Oncology Care Pack
item.g:description: Following chemo or radiation therapy, some patients suffer from dry, red, irritated and sensitive skin which can be uncomfortable and painful. This pack of MooGoo products was created to help patients hydrate, protect, soothe, and care for their skin during and after treatment. Another side effect of treatment can be cold hands and feet. To combat this, the pack includes some cosy MooGoo socks to help keep warm. Always consult your specialist before using any new products. Each pack contains: Fast Hydrating Lotion 500g, A hydrating, lightweight lotion that slides on s-MOO-th, rubs in easily and absorbs quickly. item.g:title: MooGoo Ultra Gentle Cleanser with Ceramides
item.g:description: Free from synthetic detergents, MooGoo Ultra Gentle Cleanser has been developed to be the lowest-irritation cleanser available for people with extremely sensitive skin. Using the lowest-irritation cleanser available (sodium cocoyl glutamate), MooGoo Ultra Gentle Cleanser also contains ceramides to help retain moisture within the skin. Sodium cocoyl glutamate has an irritation score that is 38% lower than other leading gentle clinical cleansers, and 75% lower than synthetic detergent, sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), found in many popular wash products. This Ultra Gentle Cleanser was specifically designed for eczema-prone, hypersensitive or fragile skin, but because of its extremely gentle nature, it's suitable for every skin type and every age, no exceptions. Ceramides are a key component of the skin that eczema or dermatitis sufferers lack. Without Ceramides, the barrier function weakens, and a compromised barrier means vital moisture can escape and external irritants, pollutants, and allergens can get in. This Ultra Gentle Cleanser cleanses the skin thoroughly and gently, while helping to restore Ceramides into the skin to help prevent that. Features: MooGoo Ultra Gentle Cleanser with Ceramides, 500ml pump action bottle, Contains ceramides to support skin barrier reinforcement, Dermatologically tested, pH Balanced (5.5), Free of parabens, phenoxyethanol and synthetic detergents, Suitable for all ages and skin types, 933595500474

item.g:description: Replenishes dry, dull and tired skin. Includes ceramides to strengthen skin barrier. item.g:title: MooGoo Vitamin C Brightening Active Serum

item.g:title: Pescatarian Paradise
item.g:description: Fish is a delicious and healthy food option, but many people find cooking it quite daunting, tending to default to a limited range of well-tried dishes. Alison Howe is here to inspire cooks to change that in her debut cookery book, Pescatarian Paradise. In this book, Alison encourages readers to create tasty seafood dishes packed with flavour, based on a wide range of cooking styles, including recipes for everyday meals and for special occasions. It provides the technical and cooking support needed to give readers the confidence to try something different and which tastes way better than they thought possible with a fish dish! This book focuses on fish caught in British coastal waters, and therefore widely available. Through the use of appropriate herbs, spices and cooking techniques it creates dishes that the author has personally enjoyed while travelling in regions as diverse as SE Asia, Europe, Scandinavia and North America. There are tips throughout the book anticipating issues that the reader might encounter, and ensures first-time success with each new recipe. This will make preparing these dishes stress-free, fun and a pleasure to eat. Author proceeds will be donated to Cancer Research UK.

item.g:title: Progress Go Healthy 2 Litre Air Fryer
item.g:description: It's easy to create healthier meals for the family with this Progress air fryer. With a 2-litre capacity, hot air is used to cook all kinds of foods using little or no oil. It's also more energy efficient than a conventional oven as there's no lengthy pre-heating times and the smaller space usually results in faster cooking times. Features: Progress Go Healthy 2 Litre Air Fryer, 1000W, 2 litre capacity, 18 x 22 x 30cm, 2.25kg, 30 minute timer, Adjustable temperature control, Removable non-stick coated cooking rack, 5054061419900

item.g:title: Progress Go Healthy 4.5 Litre Digital Air Fryer
item.g:description: It's easy to create healthier meals for the family with this Progress air fryer. The 4.5-litre capacity cooking basket helps you prepare food for all the family with hot air and little or no oil. It can also be more energy efficient than a conventional oven as there's no lengthy pre-heating times and the smaller space usually results in faster cooking times. Touch-sensitive controls are easy to use and feature 7 quick pre-sets. Features: Progress Go Healthy 4.5 Litre Digital Air Fryer, 1300W, 4.5 litre capacity, 30 x 27 x 32cm, 3.36kg, 30 minute timer, Adjustable temperature control, Removable non-stick coated cooking rack ,

item.g:title: Remembrance Lantern
item.g:description: Shine a light this Christmas for those who can't be with you at this special time of year, but are very much in your thoughts.This remembrance lantern includes a battery powered LED candle, allowing it to be safely used anywhere around the home.The beautiful poinsettia design includes the motto "Always in our hearts at Christmas".Features: 27 x 11 x 11cm, Batteries included (3 x AAA), Always remove batteries before storing for prolonged periods, Indoor use only, Contains glass - keep away from children and pets, Good to know: Battery recycling points are available in all of our shops and superstores.,

item.g:title: Robins, Wrens and Other British Birds Nature Sticker Book
item.g:description: A gorgeous sticker book series created for the National Trust, packed with facts about birds and their homes. With four pages of wildlife stickers, you can launch the ducks into the pond, fill the sky with swallows, add nests to the treetops, and much more. From oystercatchers wading in the estuary to woodpeckers nesting in the woods, this is an excellent introduction to all types of birds for the very young. Robins, wrens and other British birds nature sticker book by Nikki Dyson, ISBN: 9780857639301, Paperback, 30 x 22 x 0.5cm, 220g, 24 pages, Nosy Crow, 2017,

item.g:title: Rocket Pin Badge
item.g:description: Jet off on a fantastic future together with the help of this cute rocket-shaped pin badge wedding favour.Ideal for a couple with an interest in space or exploration, or as a perfect keepsake for a child to remember your special day.Features: Rocket Wedding Favour, Approximately 3 x 1.6cm, badge 0.1cm thick, 1cm thick including pin, White backing card included, Butterfly clasp on back, Assembly required ,

item.g:title: Rose Gold Lux Foil 1.5m Christmas Wrapping Paper - Greetings
item.g:description: Shine bright this festive season with this stunningly beautiful rose gold foil wrapping paper. This design features festive words in white on a rose gold background. Available in 3 designs, sold separately, the intricate details are lifted by the luxe foil finish. 1.5m in length, this wrap is made from paper-backed foil.

item.g:title: Rose Gold Tie Pin
item.g:description: Add a touch of contemporary style with your gift giving with this Rose Gold Tie Pin. Featuring a subtle ribbon engraving, this tie pin is a thoughtful gift for the stylish gent in your life or even perfect for thank you for your groomsmen on your wedding day. Features: Laser engraved ribbon, Measures 55 x 6.5mm,

item.g:title: Royce Georgia Pocketed T-Shirt Bra - 32B / Skin
item.g:description: This Georgia pocketed t-shirt bra by Royce is a padded, everyday bra for gentle post-surgery support. For a smooth silhouette under t-shirts and close-fitting tops, it is designed with moulded, padded cups and pure cotton lined, bilateral pockets for prosthesis. Ideal for everyday wear, it features delicate, front detailed lace and a stretch back, fastened with 2 hooks. Acting as a cotton liner within the cup, this t-shirt bra can be worn by anyone without a prosthesis, making it a go-to for an attractive, every day, comfortable wear. Features: Bilateral, shaped pockets,

Ideal for everyday wear, it features delicate, front detailed lace and a stretch back, fastened with 2 hooks. Acting as a cotton liner within the cup, this t-shirt bra can be worn by anyone without a prosthesis, making it a go-to for an attractive, every day, comfortable wear. Features: Bilateral, shaped pockets,

item.g:title: Royce Jasmine Pocketed Softcup Bra - 34B / White / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: This Jasmine pocketed softcup bra by Royce is a pretty, non-wired bra for wear after radical or partial mastectomy, lumpectomy and reconstructive surgery. Jasmine is a classic style that is firm-fitting yet supremely comfortable, with pure cotton lining/pockets as standard. Finished with attractive, lace detailing, the padded and moulded cups have bilateral pockets to hold your prosthesis securely in place. Features: Pure cotton lining/pockets, Firm support,

item.g:title: Royce Maisie Briefs - S / Blush
item.g:description: Maisie briefs by Royce are the coordinating match to the Maisie lingerie sets. item.g:title: Royce Maisie Pocketed Soft T-shirt Bra - 34B / Blush
item.g:description: This Maisie pocketed t-shirt bra by Royce is a smooth-cup, everyday bra for gentle post surgery support. Beautifully comfortable and stylish too, Maisie is a great smooth-cup bra in soft fabric with satin cuff detailing and bow. item.g:title: Royce Olivia Pocketed Contemporary Bra in White - 32B / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Olivia is simple yet stylish and designed using strong, supportive fabrics with pretty jacquard spot and gorgeous stretch lace trims to ensure a perfect fit. This style comes with lining/pockets as standard.

item.g:title: Royce Olivia Pocketed Contemporary Bra in White - 32D / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Olivia is simple yet stylish and designed using strong, supportive fabrics with pretty jacquard spot and gorgeous stretch lace trims to ensure a perfect fit. This style comes with lining/pockets as standard.

item.g:title: Royce Olivia Pocketed Contemporary Bra in White - 32DD / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Olivia is simple yet stylish and designed using strong, supportive fabrics with pretty jacquard spot and gorgeous stretch lace trims to ensure a perfect fit. This style comes with lining/pockets as standard.

item.g:title: Royce Olivia Pocketed Contemporary Bra in White - 34D / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Olivia is simple yet stylish and designed using strong, supportive fabrics with pretty jacquard spot and gorgeous stretch lace trims to ensure a perfect fit. This style comes with lining/pockets as standard.

item.g:title: Royce Pocketed Softcup Comfi-Bra - 34B/C / Black / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: This pocketed softcup Comfi-Bra by Royce is a front fastening, all day comfort bra, to wear after surgery. Featuring a super soft feel and effective fit, this bra is created from a stretchy yet rich pima cotton fabric. For easy accessibility and reduced shoulder mobility, it features front opening poppers that are ideal for inspections of surgical areas and dressing changes. For optimum support, this bra has high sides, a crop top cut and a wide back band. It's lightly padded straps and stretch under band provide optimum support and it's cut-and-sew cups are lined with soft pockets to hold prosthesis. Features: Available in black, white, and blush, Pocketed,

item.g:title: Royce Silver Post Surgery Bra - 32B/C / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: This post-surgery bra by Royce is an anti-bacterial, super-soft, breathable bra designed for use after any type of breast or chest surgery. It has been developed from anti-bacterial, anti-odour, thermo-regulating X-STATIC silver fibre to aid the healing process and allow safe wearing immediately after surgery. Built for comfort and support, it's crop top design features seam-free detail to steer irritation and a deep underbust for an optimum, secure fit. Popper, front and cushioned fastenings allow easy accessibility and touch-and-close adjustable shoulder straps maintain comfort. Double layer cups feature a pocketed area for softies if needed. Features: Anti-bacterial and anti-odour, 100% natural, Thermo-regulating, Permanent - will not wash or wear out,

item.g:description: This Stronger Than You Think card is a reassuring sentiment for someone who is going through cancer.Take the time to let someone know you are thinking of them with this meaningful, cheerful and colourful pick-me-up for someone who is going through their cancer journey.You will be sure to make their day as a little goes a long way. Features: Single card, Blank on the inside,

item.g:title: Sudoku
item.g:description: A new book of ever-popular number placement puzzles, satisfying to solve and great for giving your brain a workout.Spanning a range of difficulty levels, this collection of over 200 puzzles comes in an elegantly designed package with an elastic strap, making it the perfect gift for puzzle lovers. Sudoku by Eric Saunders, ISBN: 9781398835092, Paperback, 18 x 13 x 2cm, 310g, 256 pages,

item.g:title: Sukin for Men Facial Scrub 125ml
item.g:description: A revitalising facial scrub to remove a build-up of dirt, oil and dead skin cells with a grainy texture of bamboo powder and walnut shells. Sesame and jojoba oil work to moisturise and soften the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and purified.

item.g:title: Sukin Hydration Hydra Eye Gel 15ml
item.g:description: Take care of your under-eye area with the Sukin water-based gel. The blend of sea algae, hyaluronic acid and maize complete rehydrate your skin, leaving them looking revived for up to 72 hours.Features: 15ml, Cruelty free and vegan, Recyclable packaging, 9327693008542, Directions for useUse the tip of the tube to gently apply to clean dry eye area, glide from under eye toward outer corner and across brow bone. Gently pat gel around eye area using ring finger, allowing 1 minute for absorption.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Saccharide Isomerate (Maize Complex), Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Kelp), Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Amorphophallus Konjac Root Extract, Cellulose Gum, Carrageenan, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol.

You will be sure to make their day as a little goes a long way. Features: Single card, Blank on the inside,

item.g:title: Sunday Brunch Pair of Cheers Tim and Simon Mugs
item.g:description: Toast to Tim and Simon in style with the Sunday Brunch Mug Set. Each pack comes with two Cheers Tim!, Cheers Simon! mugs for you and a friend to enjoy a well-earned cuppa. Features: 2 bone china mugs in box, 8.2cm diameter (12cm including handle), 8.2cm tall, 16fl oz / 470ml capacity ,

item.g:title: Sunday Brunch Set of 4 Coasters
item.g:description: Need somewhere to rest your brand new Sunday Brunch mugs? Why not grab yourself the Sunday Brunch Set of 4 Coasters to give your cuppa pride of place, all while protecting your favourite tea spot! Features: 4 cork-backed MDF coasters, 10.5 x 10.5cm ,

item.g:title: Sunday Brunch Supersized Cheers! Mug
item.g:description: Normal mugs too small? Have no fear, the Sunday Brunch Supersize Mug is here! Get both hands on this mega-mug and raise a toast to Tim and Simon. Features: 1 supersized porcelain mug, 10cm diameter (15cm including handle), 11cm tall, 30fl oz / 860ml capacity ,

item.g:title: Sunday Brunch Tea Bag Tidy
item.g:description: Keep your kitchen countertop free from soggy teabag stains with your Sunday Brunch Ceramic Tea Bag Tidy. This handy kitchen accessory will make a perfect gift for tea lovers, and can even double up as a spoon rest! Features: Porcelain tea bag tidy, 11.5 x 8.5 x 1.5cm ,

item.g:title: Sunflower Matchstick Seedsticks
item.g:description: Let memories of your special day grow with these easy to plant sunflower seed Seedsticks. Each matchbook-style pack contains 5 cardboard sticks, and each stick has sunflower seeds embedded in it, ready to burst into colour. Sunflowers traditionally represent happiness, friendship, unwavering faith, and unconditional love - making them perfect as a thoughtful wedding favour for your guests, a creative way to celebrate any celebration, and a great addition to any greetings card. Features: 1 pack of 5 sunflower Seedsticks, Plastic-free; made from 100% recycled cardboard, Made in Britain, Book size approximately: 4 x 5 x 0.5cm (closed), 4 x 9 x 0.5cm (open).Each stick measures approximately 3.5 x 0.5cm.,

item.g:title: Sunflower Wedding Favour

item.g:description: A ready-made, 100% human hair wig with a loose coil curly layered style. Made with a sheer lace front hair line and a comfortable open wefted back. Please note: the wig shown in the photographs on this page show the full lace front intact. Once trimmed and fitted correctly, the lace front won't be visible. Features: Available in 2 shades: Darkest Brown and Medium Brown., 3 sliding grips for extra support., Adjustable elastic hooks allow you to tighten or loosen the wig., Includes full aftercare information and safety leaflet., Includes a complimentary 15-minute virtual consultation with a Wig Specialist to discuss aftercare, styling and answer any questions you may have., 73g, With each purchase, you will receive a complimentary 15-minute virtual consultation with a Wig Specialist to discuss aftercare, styling and answer any questions you may have. To arrange your call, please follow this link: https://www.morehairnow.com/online-booking, select a time and date, enter your details and add the hashtag #CancerCare to the comments section.

item.g:description: The sequel to the bestselling GCHQ Puzzle Book offers a whole new batch of challenges for puzzle-lovers of all abilities.2019 marked the 100-year anniversary of GCHQ, and the book was a celebration of a century's history of the organisation, with exclusive stories and photos.These puzzles are brought to us from the masterminds of the intelligence experts who keep the nation safe and puzzle fans can be sure to experience the very best in enigmatic games which will leave them head-scratching for days.Features: The GCHQ puzzle book II, ISBN: 9780241365434, 23 x 15 x 3cm,

item.g:title: The Gut Stuff
item.g:description: This book is an indispensable resource for understanding and nourishing your gut to improve your overall health and wellbeing.The importance of good gut health for our mental and physical wellbeing is being understood now more than ever before. In this essential guide, gut-health advocates Lisa and Alana Macfarlane show you everything you need to know about taking charge of your gut to improve your wellbeing.Talking you through the gut latest research and science - including the role of probiotics, the effects of illnesses, and a handy myth-busting toolkit - Lisa, Alana, and their team of top gut experts, also share lifestyle tips alongside easy-to-prepare gut-friendly recipes for all times of day.So, whether you're looking to improve your digestive health or simply want to incorporate more gut-nourishing ingredients into your diet to feel happier and healthier, this book will become your ultimate guide. Gut stuff by Alana & Lisa Macfarlane, ISBN: 9780008621513, Hardback, 25 x 20 x 3cm, 1076g, 288 pages, Previously published as The gut loving cookbook , Pavilion Books, 2024,

item.g:title: The Little Book of Resilience
item.g:description: With inspirational quotations, practical tasks and thoughtful exercises, this little book teaches you how to cope with everything life throws at you, and come back stronger. "Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success" - Dale Carnegie. The little book of resilience by Joanna Gray, ISBN: 9781837830527, Hardback, 13 x 10 x 2cm, 184g, 192 pages, Quadrille Publishing, 2024,

item.g:title: The Royal Marsden Cancer Cookbook
item.g:description: Cancer brings many challenges. Some of them include changes in body weight, appetite, the ability to taste and swallow, and the way the digestive system works. This specially designed cookbook offers more than 150 delicious, healthy recipes for all the family, as well as ideas, variations and tips. All have been reviewed by Dr Clare Shaw, Consultant Dietician at The Royal Marsden, a world-leading cancer centre. Includes contributions from top chefs and food writers, including Mary Berry, Nigella Lawson, Ruth Rogers, Rick Stein, Liz Earle, Gwyneth Paltrow, Raymond Blanc and Prue Leith. The Royal Marsden cancer cookbook : nutritious recipes for during and after cancer treatment, edited by Clare Shaw, ISBN: 9781804190654, Hardback, 26 x 21 x 3cm, 1060g, 256 pages, Octopus Publishing, 2023,

They're ideal either as a wedding favour for your guests, or as a little something between the happy couple.Features: To The Moon & Back Metallic Effect Temporary Tattoo, Tattoo approximately 4.5 x 3.5cm, supplied on a card measuring 6.5 x 12cm, Individually wrapped to protect them from moisture damage, Easy to apply using water, easy to remove using baby oil, Suitable for ages 5+, Skin safe for most, but not suitable for sensitive skin, Instructions: Remove the transparent film and place design face down onto a smooth, dry, and clean area of skin., Wet the whole of the backing paper and wait 20 seconds., Slide away the paper to reveal the design., Lasts 1-5 days, but can be removed sooner using baby oil., Ingredients:Acrylic Polymer, Cellulose Acetate Butyrate, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Rosin Modified Phenolic Resins, Glycine Soja Oil, C12-20 Iso Paraffin, Colourings: CI 45350, CI 15850, CI 74160, CI 77266.

item.g:title: True Love Metallic Effect Temporary Tattoo - 10
item.g:description: Celebrate the greatest love with this metallic copper-gold coloured temporary tattoo.Available singly, or in packs of 10, the tattoo is easy to apply in seconds with water, as well as being easy to remove. They're ideal either as a wedding favour for your guests, or as a little something between the happy couple.Features: True Love Metallic Effect Temporary Tattoo, Tattoo approximately 4.5 x 4.5cm, supplied on a card measuring 6.5 x 12cm, Individually wrapped to protect them from moisture damage, Easy to apply using water, easy to remove using baby oil, Suitable for ages 5+, Skin safe for most, but not suitable for sensitive skin, Instructions: Remove the transparent film and place design face down onto a smooth, dry, and clean area of skin., Wet the whole of the backing paper and wait 20 seconds., Slide away the paper to reveal the design., Lasts 1-5 days, but can be removed sooner using baby oil., Ingredients:Acrylic Polymer, Cellulose Acetate Butyrate, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Rosin Modified Phenolic Resins, Glycine Soja Oil, C12-20 Iso Paraffin, Colourings: CI 45350, CI 15850, CI 74160, CI 77266.

item.g:title: True Love Metallic Effect Temporary Tattoo - Single
item.g:description: Celebrate the greatest love with this metallic copper-gold coloured temporary tattoo.Available singly, or in packs of 10, the tattoo is easy to apply in seconds with water, as well as being easy to remove. They're ideal either as a wedding favour for your guests, or as a little something between the happy couple.Features: True Love Metallic Effect Temporary Tattoo, Tattoo approximately 4.5 x 4.5cm, supplied on a card measuring 6.5 x 12cm, Individually wrapped to protect them from moisture damage, Easy to apply using water, easy to remove using baby oil, Suitable for ages 5+, Skin safe for most, but not suitable for sensitive skin, Instructions: Remove the transparent film and place design face down onto a smooth, dry, and clean area of skin., Wet the whole of the backing paper and wait 20 seconds., Slide away the paper to reveal the design., Lasts 1-5 days, but can be removed sooner using baby oil., Ingredients:Acrylic Polymer, Cellulose Acetate Butyrate, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Rosin Modified Phenolic Resins, Glycine Soja Oil, C12-20 Iso Paraffin, Colourings: CI 45350, CI 15850, CI 74160, CI 77266.

item.g:title: Trulife Active Flow Breast Form - 1 / Beige / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: Perfect for all active and leisure activities such as yoga, gardening, exercise classes, jogging, even swimming. Lightweight monoprene beads do not absorb water and dry quickly, To be worn in a pocketed bra or pocketed swimwear, Available in two colour options, Suitable for use on either the left or right side,

item.g:title: Trulife Barbara Everyday Pocketed Softcup Bra in White - 32A / White / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: This Barbara everyday pocketed softcup bra in white by Trulife is a medium support bra, perfect for everyday use.Designed to enhance confidence, all-day comfort and support, this bra has a versatile fit. It includes adjustable, elastic back straps and back closure. A wide under bust band provides optimum support. Pockets provide extra coolness and comfort, made with breathable moisture-wicking COOLMAX® material.The lace overlay accentuates the tailored style, and includes a satin ribbon bow in the middle. A pretty lace trim at the neckline comes in a complimentary mix of colours.Features: 75% nylon 25% elastane, Medium support, Rear adjustable straps, Breathable CoolMax pockets both sides,

item.g:title: Trulife Initial Softie Breastform with Bag - 3 / Light Tone / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: The Initial softie breastform with bag by Trulife, is a soft, lightweight, symmetrical, triangle shape form for post-surgery and leisurewear. To stay free from pressure and enhance comfort within sensitive areas, it features a seamless mould for a natural, flattering shape and soft fabric. It's unique moisture-wicking COOLMAX® fabric on the rear offers breathability and moisture control to keep the skin cool and comfortable. By adding and removing fiberfill, its fullness is easily adjustable to suit personal needs. Designed for use after breast surgery, between radiation therapy sessions, for leisure wear or due to lymphedema or skin sensitivity. Features: 100% hypoallergenic polyester fluff, Available in Light Tone and Dark Tone, Extra fiberfill included for customized adjustment,

item.g:title: Trulife Initial Softie Breastform with Bag - 7 / Light Tone / VAT Exempt
item.g:description: The Initial softie breastform with bag by Trulife, is a soft, lightweight, symmetrical, triangle shape form for post-surgery and leisurewear. To stay free from pressure and enhance comfort within sensitive areas, it features a seamless mould for a natural, flattering shape and soft fabric. It's unique moisture-wicking COOLMAX® fabric on the rear offers breathability and moisture control to keep the skin cool and comfortable. item.g:title: Unisex Bobble Hat - White
item.g:description: Stay warm when you're out and about with this soft and cosy bobble hat with obligatory fluffy pom-pom.Co-ordinating items also available.

item.g:description: Stay warm when you're out and about with this soft and cosy bobble hat with obligatory fluffy pom-pom.Co-ordinating items also available.
