item.g:title: Unplug and Unwind
item.g:description: Checking our phones and engaging online are often necessary to stay connected and thrive in today's world but doing so constantly and mindlessly can lead to unwanted anxiety, exhaustion and discontent. There is a better way to meet these everyday challenges. Through a mindful approach and relating to situations differently, Unplug and Unwind will do just that for you.In this compendium of beautiful images and inspiring guidance, shift from doing to being and find more balance and happiness in your life. Unplug and unwind : mindful ways to rest, relax, and feel renewed, ISBN: 9781800653061, Hardback, 15 x 12 x 2cm, 238g, 144 pages, Ryland, Peters & Small, 2024,

item.g:title: Usborne Dinosaur Snap
item.g:description: An easy and fun game that's a great way for young children to develop important matching and reading skills. Usborne Dinosaur Snap Cards, ISBN: 9780746064139, 52 playing cards, 13 x 8cm, Usborne Publishing,

item.g:title: Usborne Fairy Snap
item.g:description: Snap is every child's much-loved first card game and these large, colourful and high quality cards are a great way for them to develop important matching and reading skills. Usborne Fairy Snap Cards, ISBN: 9780746076316, 52 playing cards, 13 x 8cm, Usborne Publishing,

item.g:title: Usborne First Jigsaw Animals
item.g:description: Discover the wonderful world of animals, with this delightful set of jigsaws and a book. Each sturdy jigsaw comes in two easy-to-match pieces, with charming illustrations by Stella Baggott. This is the perfect way to introduce young minds to simple problem solving, reading time and all kinds of amazing animals. Features: Animals First Jigsaws with illustrations by Stella Baggott, ISBN: 9781474988537,

item.g:title: Usborne First Jigsaw Under the Sea
item.g:description: Discover the wonderful world under the sea, with this delightful set of jigsaws and a book.Each sturdy jigsaw comes in two easy-to-match pieces, with charming illustrations by Stella Baggott.This is the perfect way to introduce young minds to simple problem solving, reading time and all kinds of amazing sea creatures, from crabs to seahorses and dolphins.Features: Under the Sea First Jigsaws with illustrations by Stella Baggott, ISBN: 9781474988551,

item.g:title: Veho ZB-1 Wireless Bluetooth In-Ear Sports Headphones
item.g:description: These ZB-1 wireless Bluetooth in-ear sports headphones by Veho are lightweight and comfortable wireless headphones.They include soft silicone ear buds to prevent noise leakage, over ear hook stability to ensure the earbuds are held firmly in place and its lightweight design makes them unnoticeable when worn.It's designed to extend overall usage time with a built-in rechargeable battery to give you up to 8 hours of listening, perfect if you're on the go.Features: 30g, Low energy Bluetooth connection, Built in microphone and single remote gives easy access to volume controls and a single multi-function button to skip tracks and answer calls, Changeable in-ear silicon buds, 10mm acoustic driver system enhances bass and delivers crystal clear balanced audio, Up to 8 hours listening on a single charge,

item.g:title: Velvet Bee Cushion - Dark Blue
item.g:description: Add a touch of elegance and comfort to your living space with our Bee Velvet Cushion. Designed in sage and floral colours, these vibrant bee cushions will add an pop of colour to your chairs and sofas. Co-ordinating items also available

item.g:title: Velvet Bee Cushion - Sage Green

item.g:title: Village 1000-Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
item.g:description: Escape to the heart of the countryside with this 1,000-piece jigsaw puzzle, featuring a beautifully illustrated village scene full of charm and natural beauty. With rolling green hills, a gentle river, and a vibrant array of wildlife, this puzzle offers a relaxing and rewarding experience for nature lovers and puzzle enthusiasts alike. Features: 1,000-piece Village design jigsaw puzzle, Made from high quality coated board, Exclusive to Cancer Research UK , When you've completed your puzzle, why not donate it to your nearest Cancer Research UK shop to be loved by someone else? Find your nearest shop or superstore here.

item.g:title: Walking Meditations
item.g:description: Walking meditation, also known as Kinhin meditation, is widely practiced in Buddhism. It can be done in a few steps at home, a short walk on a bustling street, or a longer hike in the countryside. This beautifully illustrated book will guide you through the process of finding inner peace while on the move, with a selection of meditations for every season, long and short walks in both a natural and an urban setting, and meditations for calmness, creativity and focus. Walking meditations by Danielle North, ISBN: 9781783255627, Hardback, 18 x 13 x 2cm, 332g, 160 pages, Octopus Publishing, 2023,

item.g:title: We Are Together
item.g:description: On our own, we're special, and we can chase our dream. But when we join up, hand in hand, together, we're a team. Celebrate the power of love and friendship in this beautiful book by award-winning illustrator and author Britta Teckentrup. With vibrant artwork and peek-through pages, this is a picture book to treasure.

item.g:title: Welsh Flag Pin Badge
item.g:description: Celebrate your diwrnod arbennig, or special day, with this Welsh flag pin badge.Featuring the draig goch red dragon flag with bright enamel colour fill, 'flying' from a silver-coloured flagpole on the left.Features: Welsh Flag Wedding Favour, Approximately 2.5 x 2.5cm, with the flag element itself approx. 2.2 x 1.5cm, Badge 0.1cm thick, 1cm thick including pin, White backing card included, Butterfly clasp on back, Assembly required,

item.g:title: When Things Don't Go Your Way
item.g:description: Life doesn't always go our way. Loss, rejection, uncertainty and loneliness are unavoidable - but there is solace to be found even in moments of greatest difficulty.Through a combination of beautiful illustrations, insightful stories, and contemplative aphorisms, Zen Buddhist teacher Haemin Sunim helps us reframe our mindsets and develop emotional agility. Whether you're in the midst of a crisis or simply seeking to improve your mental and emotional wellbeing, this book will provide courage and comfort when you need it most. When things don't go your way : zen wisdom for difficult times by Haemin Sunim, ISBN: 9780241457290, Hardback, 18 x 13 x 3cm, 538g, 272 pages, Penguin Books, 2024,

item.g:title: Where's the Dragon?
item.g:description: Follow Blaze and his six fire-breathing friends as they lock up their treasure troves and set off on a magical quest to explore new realms.Can you find the seven dragons of Cloud Mountain in every scene?From a clockwork city and a mystical cave to a forest and a masquerade ball, there are 17 destinations to explore.Features: Where's the Dragon? by Paul Moran, ISBN: 9781789293074, Paperback, 48 pages, 28 x 22cm, For ages 5+,

item.g:title: Where's The Unicorn? A Magical Search and Find Book
item.g:description: This where's the unicorn? A magical search & find book is a colourful puzzle book, following the adventures of the mystical unicorn.Keep yourself entertained, pass the time and escape into a magical, adventure quest of globetrotting unicorns. Including 17 detailed designs to devour, gallop your way through film premieres, canter to campsites under the stars and even trot to Antarctica to join the whale-watching penguins.Features: 48 pages, Ages 5+, 280x216mm, Paperback,

item.g:title: Women in Science: 50 fearless pioneers who changed the world
item.g:description: A gloriously illustrated celebration of trailblazing women. Women in Science highlights the contributions of fifty notable women to the STEM fields of science, technology, engineering and mathematics, from both the ancient and modern worlds. The book also contains fascinating infographics and an illustrated scientific glossary. The extraordinary women profiled include well-known figures like the physicist and chemist Marie Curie, as well as lesser-known pioneers such as Katherine Johnson, the African-American mathematician who calculated the trajectory of the Apollo 11 mission to the moon. Women in Science celebrates the achievements of the intrepid women who have paved the way for the next generation of female engineers, biologists, mathematicians, doctors, astronauts, physicists and beyond... Women in Science: 50 fearless pioneers who changed the world by Rachel Ignotofsky, ISBN: 9781526360519, 128 pages, hardback book, 20 x 23 cm, 580g,

item.g:title: Yin & Yang Pin Badge
item.g:description: Slot the missing piece into your wedding day with this Yin & Yang Pin Badge.A design taken from the familiar Chinese philosophical Yin Yang concept with a sparkly twist, it is often recognised as a symbol of the balance of opposing forces; good and bad, positive and negative and ups and downs.With significance to marriage values and uniting two together, it is a complimentary way to celebrate a union, as well a touching keepsake for your guests to take away.Please note, as part of our efforts to reduce the amount of glitter in our product range, this pin badge has recently been redesigned and no longer contains glitter.Features: Butterfly clutch fitting, Backing card included, Assembly required, The poly bags used are made from Polypropylene material which is recycled,

item.g:title: You Are Amazing Greetings Card
item.g:description: A light-hearted encouragement card to send love, support and positivity to someone you love. It can be difficult to know what to say, but reaching out with much-needed gentle encouragement will go along way. You'll be sure to make a thoughtful impression.

item.g:title: You Are Blooming Lovely Artificial Succulent Plant
item.g:description: A cute little gift for a loved one, this miniature artificial succulent plant not only looks adorable, it also shares a heartfelt motto. Includes the phrase "you are blooming lovely". Approximately 13cm tall x 9cm diameter.

item.g:title: You Are Blooming Lovely Mug
item.g:description: A beautiful, flower and bee design ceramic mug that's ideal for any garden lover, nature enthusiast, or just as a gift to yourself for a moment of relaxation. Alongside the flowers and bees is the phrase "you are blooming lovely".

item.g:title: You Are Blooming Lovely Watering Can Hanging Decoration
item.g:description: Spread the love with this cute hanging decoration. Perfect for a garden lover, the wooden, watering can-shaped decoration with hanging ribbon is printed with the motto: "You are blooming lovely". 14 x 9.5 x 1cm

item.g:description: Let your close ones know you're thinking of them during their cancer journey with this You Are Loved card. If you know someone who's going through cancer treatment, a greetings card could give them a bit of much-needed light relief.

item.g:description: Struggling to find the right words? item.g:title: You Are So Awesome: uplifting words to help you shine
item.g:description: Be the boss of your thoughts and feelings, and don't let any negative vibes get you down with this little book of feel-good quotations and statements.Dip into it whenever you need a boost and let the encouraging words help you reflect on how amazingly awesome you are.Features: You are so awesome, ISBN: 9781800070004, Hardback, 160 pages, 14 x 10cm,

item.g:title: You Are Strong Greetings Card
item.g:description: Whatever your loved one is going through, reach out to them with this You Are Strong card. You will definitely put a smile on their face. It's difficult to know what to say to loved ones going through treatment and recovery, but a little goes a long way. Reach out with gentle reassurance to those who need encouragement the most, with this motivational greetings card. Blank on the inside for your own message.

item.g:description: This "you rang the chemo bell" card is a considerate way to reach out to a close one who has just completed their cancer treatment.It can be hard to know what to write to someone who is going through cancer, but this lighthearted and humorous approach will sure make a lasting impression.There are many serious conversations to be had when you're diagnosed with cancer, but the silly moments are important too!Features: Single card, Blank on the inside,

The reverse reveals her signature engraved in white with a butterfly pinch clasp."I wanted to create a design that had a meaning to me and chose classic Zandra Rhodes imagery; The Face and The Wiggle to enhance and beautify the pins." -- Zandra Rhodes 21x21mm, Butterfly pinch clasp,
